verses.verse: Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, "Go <WH1980> again, <WH5750> love <WH157> a woman <WH802> [who] is loved <WH157> by [her] husband, <WH7453> yet an adulteress, <WH5003> even as the Lord <WH3068> loves <WH157> the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> though they turn <WH6437> to other <WH312> gods <WH430> and love <WH157> raisin <WH809> <WH6025> cakes. <WH809>"
So I bought <WH3739> her for myself for fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> [shekels] of silver <WH3701> and a homer <WH9149> and a half <WH3963> of barley. <WH8184>

Then I said <WH559> to her, "You shall stay <WH3427> with me for many <WH7227> days. <WH3117> You shall not play <WH2181> the harlot, <WH2181> nor <WH3808> shall you have <WH1961> a man; <WH376> so I will also <WH1571> be toward <WH413> you."

For the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> will remain <WH3427> for many <WH7227> days <WH3117> without <WH369> king <WH4428> or prince, <WH8269> without <WH369> sacrifice <WH2077> or [sacred] pillar, <WH4676> and without <WH369> ephod <WH646> or household <WH8655> idols. <WH8655>

Afterward <WH310> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> will return <WH7725> and seek <WH1245> the Lord <WH3068> their God <WH430> and David <WH1732> their king; <WH4428> and they will come <WH6342> trembling <WH6342> to the Lord <WH3068> and to His goodness <WH2898> in the last <WH319> days. <WH3117>
